column4: hey guys, i got Kubuntu installed, but i cant get the wireless card to work, what can i do to get it going?????
tell us more about the problem
the wireless just doesnt work, its a linksys wmp54g wireless card
come on, more info, does it show up as a device ? how are you trying to configure it, are you using encyption, what version of ubuntu, etc, give us info
